name: Covid Chaos (KrrishCaterpiller)
description:
Made with Unreal Engine 4.25.

You are in a small town. Due to the chaos caused by covid in the town, randomly people will be infected by and turn red in colour. You are supposed to save them by going close to them and pressing k. This will turn their colour back to normal and thus you have to save people like this. However if you stay near the infected person for too long you might get infected and then the game restarts. There are many cars also, adding to the chaos of the town. You will also have a bike, which you can ride to travel faster.

Controls:

wasd / arrow keys for moving

mouse for turning

space for jumping

shift for sprinting
